item.title: UT2Vote/UTComp Issue?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Oz{Rx})
item.dc:creator: Oz{Rx}
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm not sure if this is a UT2Vote issue or a UTComp issue or what. I have UT2Vote 6.1 and 5.9 before it and UTComp 1.7aFINAL installed on my server and occasionally (seemingly at random) after a map is voted, the server fails to load the map, dumps UTComp and loads default settings instead of whatever I had set up in UT2Vote. My server is at 209.247.83.53:7777.

I'm only asking here because another server that I play on a lot (PGP 184.65.105.87:7777) was having the same issue a...

UT2Vote/UTComp Issue?

item.title: UT2Vote58
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
UT2Vote 59 - Released February 2009

Name: UT2Vote
Version: 5.9
Description: A Voting mutator for UT2004
Comments: Over 50 Games can be configured and over 50 odd Mutators. Clan Match and Warmup options also available with Game Setup options. Extensive Admin options also available to configure each Game seperately.
Credits: ProAsm & Team - Socke, [PHX]Big_Deal, Assraker, PoW, Imaginos, frogger, sh0V3l, hmishima, Mephisto, tuco, CvRoy, Nikki, De$tiNy, Yakomo
UT2Vote Website:...

UT2Vote58

item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
Code:
CustomGame[0]=(bUse=True,MapFolder="[b]Maps/TDM,Maps/Instagib,Maps/RA[/b]",DefaultMap="DM-Deck16][",GameName="Tounament DeathMatch",GameClass="Botpack.DeathMatchPlus",Mutators="",Settings="FragLimit=30,TimeLimit=20")
CustomGame[1]=(bUse=True,MapFolder="[b]Maps/RA[/b]",DefaultMap="DM-Deck16][",GameName="Rocket Arena DeathMatch",GameClass="Botpack.DeathMatchPlus",Mutators="Botpack.RocketArena",Settings="FragLimit=30,TimeLimit=20")...

Name: Zound
Version: 5.4
Compatibility: 3369+/-

Comments: This is a major upgrade to this mutator. All admins are encouraged to upgrade to take advantage of the many new enhancements. Special thanks to ProAsm for entertaining all of the suggestions from the community and taking this mutator to...

Zound54

item.title: UT2Vote 5.9 x UTComp 1.7a (and 1.7a_3fix)
item.author: invalid@example.com (enxaqca)
item.dc:creator: enxaqca
item.content:encoded:
Hi there!

i'm trying to use UT2Vote 5.9 + UTComp 1.7a_3fix + DuelGame 4.2

I can make the server go up but it doesn't load the UTComp mutator.

That's what I did so far to try making it work:

Server command line:
./ucc-bin server DM-Rankin?Game=DuelGame42.DuelGame?Mutator=UT2Vote59.UT2VoteX ini=ut2004_duel.ini log=../logs/srvlog.log multihome=189.1.173.4 -nohomedir &

UT2VOTE mutators Config

[UT2Vote59.UT2VoteConfigs]...

UT2Vote 5.9 x UTComp 1.7a (and 1.7a_3fix)

item.title: ServerBots2 Crashing server
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonjaa)
item.dc:creator: Bonjaa
item.content:encoded: I have been running ServerBots2 on our server for quite sometime. One thing that I am running into is that when commanding the majority of the bots to stay in a room - it causes the server to crash and than it will restart as normal. It is getting a little annoying as some players are doing this deliberately. Has anyone run into this? Any suggestions?

item.title: Multi Server with UT2VOTE59
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jeremweb)
item.dc:creator: Jeremweb
item.content:encoded:
Hello everybody,
Today I wanted to test the multi server. Could you give me more information on installing the UT2VOTE multiplayer server?
I copy and paste the file. UT2004.ini txt and I configured, but only one server appears.

I have a second problem, my server is no longer referenced in the master server list with the mutators ...

Thank you for your reply

item.title: Zound55 randomly stops working
item.author: invalid@example.com (PushPull99)
item.dc:creator: PushPull99
item.content:encoded:
Hi Proasm,

don't know if there is a more suitable forum, but I'll post here anyway:
After upgrading to Zound55 I see it randomly stops working. When it does, the menu is still available - but it says "unlimited sounds", and no sounds are working. I have a limit on 15 sounds per round, which is displayed when Zound works. When Zound fails it starts working again on next map. The intro music (which is suppose to only appear once) is then played over again when starting the next map. I'm...

Zound55 randomly stops working

item.content:encoded:

Wormbo just said that ProAsm was still active in here! Well, if you're still here, please take a look at: http://forums.beyondunreal.com/showthread.php?p=2430174#post2430174

Wormbo also doesn't know the problem but I'm sure you do!

Thanks in advance,
Rawox

item.title: Spectate
item.author: invalid@example.com (NEGATIVE-0[SM])
item.dc:creator: NEGATIVE-0[SM]
item.content:encoded: Is there way I set a password for spectating? Could this be a UT2vote option in the future? I want clan members to be the only ones to use spectate for moderating the server. In other words, password the spectate slots.

item.title: Demorec Problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (rdy2bz)
item.dc:creator: rdy2bz
item.content:encoded:
Hi Proasm,

nice work! I'm using your UT2004-Tools for ages on my LAN servers, never had a problem.
But recently I had to delete your AutoDemorec from the server packages because of a weird problem.

As soon as the match starts, all players are thrown off the server and have to re-connect via the online-connection (lower Tickrate) and the server starts dong this kind of things:
Code:
Fixing up ../Textures/AS_FX_TX.utx from 2 to 1
Fixing up ../Textures/CubeMaps.utx from 2 to 1
Fixing...
Demorec Problem

item.title: Ut2Vote Problem: "Cannot vote twice the same map"
item.author: invalid@example.com (igreja94)
item.dc:creator: igreja94
item.content:encoded:
I'm a UT2Vote 59 user. When i invite a player to play with me, in the end of the map, when the UT2Vote Box open, for example, my friend select Deck17, and if i want to vote Deck17 too, it says : "Cannot vote twice the same map"

Another situation:
When he selects Deck17, and for expample i select Curse4, UT2Vote changes my friend's vote, to the map i selected....

Please help me fixing his problem ....

Thanks

item.title: "Freon" Thaw to 100% code in UT2Vote?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Piglet)
item.dc:creator: Piglet
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Please could you share the code for the Freon "thaw to 100%" code?

I'm updating the "cuddles" freon code at the moment, and would like to put this or some variant of it into the main package as an optional component.

Thanks in advance

item.title: can't hit bots
item.author: invalid@example.com (skary[WTF])
item.dc:creator: skary[WTF]
item.content:encoded: after i installed ut2vote to my server me and my other members have noticed that on occasion you can't shoot the bots. in fact, it appeared to me that when my bullets came into contact with the bots, they became inactive all together. they just stopped in their tracks. this can all be fixed with a map change or restart, but it may drive noobs away who don't want to mess with it. any ideas?

item.title: Another DemoRec problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (PartyAnimal)
item.dc:creator: PartyAnimal
item.content:encoded:
I am running DemoRec42 on a dedicated seperate PC. It records all the standard game types fine, but it will not record any of the 3SPN gametypes like TAM, AM, Freon, and such. It will record shots being fired but you can't see any players, and you can't switch between players. Nor can you right click and go into free move mode.

I have also installed all the correct packages onto my other machine, but I am still at a loss as to why the 3SPN demos will not play.

Has anyone else...

Another DemoRec problem

item.title: UT2Vote5.9 Map Rotation hiding!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonjaa)
item.dc:creator: Bonjaa
item.content:encoded: Is there a way to enable a map rotation, where after the present map being played will not be able to be voted for another 4 to 5 rounds(or whatever preference). Is this possible?

item.title: [feature request] Voted list
item.author: invalid@example.com (rdy2bz)
item.dc:creator: rdy2bz
item.content:encoded:
Hi Proasm,
maybe you are interested in adding a feature for me. I found out that it's impossible to do a regular endgame vote. Usually I have more than a dozen clients, and you'll always find at least one person who is not able to vote correctly.

Maybe it could help if you have a message of some kind showing in the Vote menu which says if you have or not already voted.

For the admin it would be a great help to have a clear list of the persons who did not vote in the log or on the...

[feature request] Voted list

item.title: ServerBots2
item.author: invalid@example.com (HornDog)
item.dc:creator: HornDog
item.content:encoded:
How do we know what version we have when the files are all the same name and the ini is too?

Also when the ServerBots ini is set at "BotSkill=1" the bots play at the "Average" level and local stats record them as such.

Thanks

item.title: UT2Vote Mod/mutator setups
item.author: invalid@example.com (Imaginos)
item.dc:creator: Imaginos
item.content:encoded:
Common info - important notes

This will be a sticky to answer common setups for mod x or mutator x for use with UT2Vote. With the UT2004 Editor's Choice version about to come out, many people may suddenly want to host multiple mods/mutators. UT2Vote is simply the best way to do it.

The included DummyMut mutator should be used when a Mod requires multiple serverpackages. The DummyMut allows for 26 dummy mutator classes: DummyMut.DummyMutA through DummyMut.DummyMutZ; each can...

UT2Vote Mod/mutator setups
